title: Scrambled Eggs with Chorizo Recipe
description: This chorizo and egg recipe is a quick, easy, flavorful scramble with spicy sausage that's perfect when you're looking for a no-cheese breakfast dish.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe:¬†Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Eggs Scrambled Scrambled Eggs with Chorizo 4.7 (32) 27 Reviews 5 Photos This chorizo and egg dish is an appetizing breakfast with spicy flavor. My Mexican husband taught me this simple and delicious recipe that serves 2 people, and I use no more than 6 eggs for both of us. You might use less or more ‚Äî it doesn't matter. Submitted by cupcake_sweetie Updated on November 13, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 5 5 5 5 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 2 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings cooking spray ¬º cup Mexican-style chorizo, or more to taste 6 large eggs salt to taste Directions Grease a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray; warm over medium-high heat. Cook and stir chorizo in the hot skillet until browned, about 5 minutes. Whisk together eggs and salt in a medium bowl until combined; pour over chorizo in the skillet; cook and stir until eggs are set, about 5 minutes. Recipe Tip You can add whatever you like to this dish because eggs are very versatile. Don't forget about bacon! I Made It Print 59 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Scrambled Eggs with Chorizo 01 of 05 Photo by¬† MangoPickle 02 of 05 Photo by¬† Michelle Gebhart 06/17/2023 Simple and scrumptious. It gets 5 stars anyway but I'd give it 10 just to cancel out the 1 star reviewer who just doesn't like chorizo. üôÑü§£ 03 of 05 Photo by¬† MangoPickle 12/29/2018 Very quick and easy one skillet dish! I added fresh cilantro near the end and as a garnish. 04 of 05 Photo by¬† MangoPickle 12/29/2018 Very quick and easy one skillet dish! I added fresh cilantro near the end and as a garnish. 05 of 05 Photo by¬† Yoly 07/08/2017 This is a basic recipe that I have been eating my whole life, Chorizo con Huevos. Nothing is ever measured, just add to liking. If you're a chorizo lover like I am then it's more Chorizo than eggs. 1 You‚Äôll Also Love Microwave Longaniza con Huevos Chorizo con Huevos (Spicy Mexican Sausage with Eggs) 38 Ratings Spanish Chorizo and Tomato Scrambled Eggs 17 Ratings Tortilla Chorizo Scramble 19 Ratings Creamy Cottage Cheese Scrambled Eggs 184 Ratings Black Bean Breakfast Bowl 134 Ratings Papas con Chorizo 8 Ratings Mexican Migas 6 Ratings Easy Chorizo Street Tacos 50 Ratings Zucchini with Egg 17 Ratings Green Chile Tortilla Scramble 11 Ratings Green Chile Microwave Scrambled Eggs 1 Rating Sausage, Egg, and Cheese Scramble 90 Ratings Easy Money Breakfast Burritos 27 Ratings Microwave Scrambled Eggs 6 Ratings Scrambled Egg and Sausage Breakfast Bowl 2 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices ¬† Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith¬†publishing¬†family. name: cupcake_sweetie
instructions: Grease a large nonstick skillet with cooking spray; warm over medium-high heat. Cook and stir chorizo in the hot skillet until browned, about 5 minutes.;Whisk together eggs and salt in a medium bowl until combined; pour over chorizo in the skillet; cook and stir until eggs are set, about 5 minutes.
